modName: Shiny Transparent Glass Armor CHSBHC CBBE BBP

descriptionHtml:
Shiny Transparent Glass Armor CHSBHC CBBE BBP
by
Restutitor Orbis

1.0
Released: 01-26-2013
Last Update: 02-04-2013
============================================================

- Requirements -

None
============================================================

- Overview -

This is a very shiny and transparent version of the regular female glass armor, with BBP and more ample proportions. It is a replacer rather than a standalone and simply overwrites the vanilla meshes and texture files. All meshes are textures have been relocated into the meshes\\armor\\glass\\f subfolder so that they will not overwrite the files for any male glass armor you may have. No shields or weapons are included. 

============================================================

- Details -

This is really a very slightly modified combination of elements from two other mods. Most of the meshes and HD textures are taken from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29123]Clear Glass Armor and Weapons in HD with craftable UNP by skysan4298[/url] and the mesh for the cuirass is taken from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7475]CHSBHC Conversions with BBP by Nimbonius[/url]; both are used with permission as well as with large amounts of help from both of these very generous and knowledgeable people. There have been several modifications made by me to both the meshes and the textures under their expert tutelage, but they are not responsible for any of my final decisions as to where to go with this. Thanks also to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30031]Cimmerian Race by GPM26[/url], which provided the race of the model and the inspiration to \"make a really hot big Cimmerian female\" for posting on that site. I apologize to GMP26 and to Cimmerians everywhere for the further cultural insensitivity of displaying her in skimpy glass armor rather than in full barbaric splendor, but I think you might appreciate the result. The motivation was to add greater transparency to the glass armor (since the vanilla glass armor never looked quite like glass to me), make the whole thing shinier, and add BBP. I also needed armor that was amply-proportioned enough for my \"big Cimmerian female\" character to fit into, given her well-developed pectoral muscles.

============================================================

- History -

Version 1.0 - my first feeble attempt
Version 2.0 - added optional CBBE 3.2 meshes and textures

============================================================

- Optional CBBE 3.2 Cuirass Replacer for Shiny Transparent Glass Armor-

Resources from the main file are needed for this to work.  Just overwrite the meshes and textures with the new ones and the outfit is converted to CBBE 3.2 from CHSBHC!

The modified meshes are adapted from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor for CBBEv3 Bodyslide and BBP by ChronoTrigger77[/url], and used with his permission.  The textures used are from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29123]Clear Glass Armor and Weapons in HD with craftable UNP by skysan4298[/url], and also used with his permission. 

The new model for the Shiny Transparent CBBE 3.2 BBP Cuirass Replacer in the screenshots is [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30914]Anastasia - Breton Femme Fatale by ajh283[/url], because I needed a CBBE 3.2 model that was not quite as \"really big and hot\" as Valeria the Cimmerian. Sorry, babe!

============================================================

- Tools Used -

ANB ReadMe Generator NifSkope GIMP

============================================================

- Credits -

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29123]Clear Glass Armor and Weapons in HD with craftable UNP by skysan4298[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7475]CHSBHC Conversions with BBP by Nimbonius[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor for CBBEv3 Bodyslide and BBP by ChronoTrigger77[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30031]Cimmerian Race by GPM26[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30914]Anastasia - Breton Femme Fatale by ajh283[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22378]ANB ReadMe Generator by Aridale Noblebrook Belmont[/url]

============================================================

- Permissions -

Permissions obtained from skysan4298, from Nimbonius, and from ChronoTrigger77.

============================================================

- Disclaimer -

If I inadvertently included anybody else\'s work without acknowledgement, please let me know!

============================================================
